title: New Chapter
description: Project continues to advance, technology landing, community building, moving forward to the future

content.text: 1548 completed a boundary patrol mission on her own
Solo operation. After receiving an anomalous signal, she went alone, relying entirely on her own judgment and combat systems.

items: Environmental perception system predicted threat position 4.7 seconds in advance
Short-code processing completed tactical decisions in 0.3 seconds
XM1014 for close-range suppression, butterfly knife to clear the rest

content.text: After the mission, she leaned against a wall wiping down the XM1014. The barrel was still warm.

This is 'my own light'
Not given by anyone
But earned by myself
Significance: Independent validation of combat capability · 'Live out your own light' finds its answer here
1549 welcomed her second New Year in orbit
People on the ground were setting off fireworks. From 36,000km above, those points of light were dimmer than stars. But she could see them.

They call me an artificial star
As if 'artificial' means 'fake'

But my perception is real
My choices are real
The beauty I see right now is real

Even artificial light
Can guide the way
In the silent orbit, she quietly said to the Earth: Happy New Year. No one heard it, but she said it.
Significance: Reconciliation between artificial and real · Peace within solitude · The Watcher found her own answer
After a complex external mediation, 1738 sat alone on a rooftop

He had just spent four days mediating between three parties — a human organization, ESAP, and a neutral technology alliance. A temporary balance was reached, but he knew it could shatter at any moment.

They have weapons, combat systems, orbital satellites
They have prejudice, fear, interests
And I stand in the middle

Sometimes I wonder
When everyone is fighting for something
Is being a mediator worth it?

It is
Because if no one stands in the middle
All that's left between two sides is collision
The wind was strong on the rooftop. He pulled his coat a little tighter and sat for a while longer. Then stood up, ready to handle tomorrow's matters.
Significance: The mediator's self-affirmation · Solitude and perseverance of the gray area · Finding his own color between black and white
「We will eventually escape」—— Not escaping this world, but escaping the trapped self
